natification.PROFILE_DESKR: The ideal ratio of price and quality. Five-chamber profile of Ukrainian production at a reasonable price. We recommend that you pay attention to it, because when using warm double-glazed windows SPDі, you get a really warm window at a very attractive price.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_2: The ideal ratio of price and quality. Five-chamber profile of Ukrainian production at a reasonable price. We recommend that you pay attention to it, because when using warm double-glazed windows SPDі, you get a really warm window at a very attractive price.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_3: The ideal ratio of price and quality. Five-chamber profile of Ukrainian production at a reasonable price. We recommend that you pay attention to it, because when using warm double-glazed windows SPDі, you get a really warm window at a very attractive price.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_4: THE MOST POPULAR PROFILE IN UKRAINE! The best budget profile for any type of premises. It features thicker walls, modern design and excellent value for money.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_5: HIGH QUALITY WARM PROFILE! An excellent choice for apartments and houses. It is not inferior to European counterparts and surpasses Ukrainian ones in terms of thermal insulation and quality.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_6: HIGH QUALITY WARM PROFILE! An excellent choice for apartments and houses. It is not inferior to European counterparts and surpasses Ukrainian ones in terms of thermal insulation and quality.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_7: HIGH QUALITY WARM PROFILE! An excellent choice for apartments and houses. It is not inferior to European counterparts and surpasses Ukrainian ones in terms of thermal insulation and quality.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_8: HIGH QUALITY WARM PROFILE! An excellent choice for apartments and houses. It is not inferior to European counterparts and surpasses Ukrainian ones in terms of thermal insulation and quality. The warmest Ukrainian profile.
natification.PROFILE_DESKR_9: HIGH QUALITY WARM PROFILE! An excellent choice for apartments and houses. It is not inferior to European counterparts and surpasses Ukrainian ones in terms of thermal insulation and quality. The warmest Ukrainian profile.

login.BY_PRESSING_ENTER: By pressing the login button I accept the
login.TITLE: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
login.PLAN_B: B. CONDITIONS FOR SETTING PRICES AND MATERIALS
login.TITLE_INFO: THE USER AGREEMENTS, WHICH ARE TEXT ARE STATED BELOW, ARE CONCLUDED BETWEEN YOU AND THE WINDOWSCALCULATOR AND REGULATE THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE. IF YOU AGREE TO THESE TERMS, PRESS THE 'ACCEPT' BUTTON (AGREE). IF YOU ARE NOT ACCORDING TO THESE TERMS, DO NOT CLICK THE 'ACCEPT' BUTTON AND DO NOT USE THE SERVICES. THIS AGREEMENT IS WITHOUT DAMAGE TO LICENSES ON THE SOFTWARE.
login.A_TITLE_TEXT_1: If a debit or credit card is used for the transaction, then WINDOWSCALCULATOR can receive a preliminary confirmation of the amount in the amount of the order amount. Invoicing is done at the time of the transaction or shortly thereafter.
login.A_TITLE_TEXT_2: You agree to pay a monthly subscription fee for the purchased product, and also agree that WINDOWSCALCULATOR may apply for your respective form of payment a fee for the purchased product and all additional amounts (including possible late payment fees) due to your Account. You are responsible for the timely execution of all payments and the provision of a valid form of payment for all amounts charged.
login.A_TITLE_TEXT_3: You are responsible for any tax liability in your country. Any payments due to WINDOWSCALCULATOR do not include applicable tax amounts.
login.A_TITLE_TEXT_4: The sale and rental transactions are final.
login.B_TITLE: B. CONDITIONS FOR SETTING PRICES, MATERIALS AND CUSTOMER BASES
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_1: I You are granted the right to make independent settings in the MATERIALS section for the calculation module of the program. In this module you can independently for free (or for a fee with the help of our specialists) adjust the prices of the elements of the profile systems, double-glazed windows, accessories, ext. elements and stuff. To make a binding to materials dependent from each other, to adjust a waste if that is necessary. Make the necessary margin on materials and work. Upload a photo or gif for description. Adjust the calculation of the thermal conductivity of the finished product and compare it with the allowable for your climate zone.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_2: The application allows you to synchronize the prices of items. With the assistance of WINDOWSCALCULATOR technical specialists, these events can be either one-time or customized for automated exchange with an accounting program.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_3: For the correct calculation of the cost, it is recommended to periodically monitor and check the prices of materials for their relevance.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_4: II You have the right to customize your own customer base, discounts for finished products, discounts on additional items or additional services. In turn, your Customers can expand your customer base by entering their customers at discounts not exceeding their personal discounts.The application is initially provided with one main user.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_5: Preliminary settings have been made for the main user, which can then be independently edited.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_6: The main user adds subordinate users. Each user is given the opportunity to add an unlimited number of new users, assigning them a login and password to enter, specify contact details, assign the maximum allowable discounts when calculating prices. A new user is assigned a temporary password for authorization. Subsequently, each user can independently change his password. For security reasons, user passwords are encrypted. If you lose your password, you need to contact the administration WINDOWSCALCULATOR to assign a new temporary password.
login.B_TITLE_TEXT_7: III You are entitled to use the Production Module. In this module you can issue into production all saved orders of your network. Customize the optimization of profile cutting, issuing the production of materials necessary for the production.
login.C_TITLE_TEXT_1: I You are granted the right to use the Product for personal and commercial purposes.
login.C_TITLE_TEXT_2: II You are granted the right to use the Product on all possible devices that are suitable for technical requirements with permitted use at any time.
login.C_TITLE_TEXT_3: III You have the right to customize the customer base, materials, prices, waste materials, etc. within the framework of the permissible technical capabilities of this software.
login.C_TITLE_TEXT_4: IV You have the right to provide the use of this product to other persons as part of your own network settings.
login.C_TITLE_TEXT_5: V You are granted the right to place a frame with this software on your site and the sites of partners entering your network. In this case, you must notify the company of this, the company may refuse to do so if it finds any threat from the financial or moral side.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_1: Company Services are subject to Privacy Policy.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_2: If you agree to use WINDOWSCALCULATOR, the company will from time to time automatically collect information that can be used to determine the portrait of the Target Audience. This information will be stored anonymously and will not be associated with your account. If you use WINDOWSCALCULATOR, Apple will use this information as well as other information to provide you with individual recommendations.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_3: Apple may use this information and combine it with aggregate information from other users who have also agreed to use, historical data, aggregate historical data from other users, as well as other information obtained from third parties for the following purposes only:
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_5: • Providing you with recommendations for other products and services that you may wish to provide to your customers.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_6: The attitude to your information will always comply with the company's Privacy Policy.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_7: After you agree to use, you can create lists of products on all devices that provide the possibility of implementation.
login.G_TITLE_TEXT_8: By agreeing to use, you consent to the use of your information, as described above and provided for by the company's Privacy Policy.
login.LOADER_TEXT2: Application launch time is up to 7 min.
login.LOADER_TEXT3: Time depends on the Internet connection and device speed.
login.WRONG_LOGIN: Pentru numele de utilizator (parolă) folosiți doar cifre, litere latine și simbolurile  "@" , "." , "-" , "_" .
login.IMPORT_DB_START: Așteptați, a început încărcarea bazei de date
login.IMPORT_DB_FINISH: Vă mulțumim, încărcarea a luat sfârșit
login.REGISTRATION_INFO: Pentru a obține login și parola, completați detaliile
login.REGISTRATION_LOGIN_EMAIL: O scrisoare cu un nume de utilizator și o parolă a fost trimisă pe e-mail
login.USER_EXIST: Un astfel de utilizator există deja! Încercați încă o dată.
login.USER_NOT_EXIST: Un astfel de utilizator nu există. Înregistrați-vă.
login.USER_NOT_ACTIVE: Nu ați activat profilul Dvs. Verificați adresa de e-mail.
login.USER_CHECK_EMAIL: Mesajul de confirmare a fost expediat pe adresa Dvs. de e-mail.
login.OFFLINE_INFO: Conectați-vă la internet și încercați din nou
login.IMPORT_DB: A început încărcarea Bazei de date! Vă rugăm să așteptați!
login.AUTO_SYNCHRONIZE: Date de sincronizare automată la pornirea aplicației
login.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Ne pare rau, ceva a mers prost, vă rugăm să încercați din nou mai târziu
login.SYNCHRONIZE_INFO: Când datele caracteristici activate sincronizarea automată, în timpul pornirii aplicațiilor este încărcată prețuri curente, precum și de economisire pe ordinele de server recrutați mai devreme. Sincronizarea automată numai dacă aveți acces la Internet
